sentences.en: A knowledge of her upbringing is basic to an understanding of her books.
sentences.cn: 要读懂她的书就要首先了解她的成长经历.

sentences.en: After a very proper upbringing he chose to lead the Bohemian life of an artist.
sentences.cn: 他受过正统的教育,却立意过着艺术家我行我素的生活.

sentences.en: Despite her religious upbringing, Aileen was decidedly a victim of her temperament.
sentences.cn: 尽管受了宗教教育, 爱玲无疑是个非常任性的人.

sentences.en: He had a fairly cushy upbringing.
sentences.cn: 他的成长过程相当快乐。

sentences.en: He had a normal middle - class upbringing.
sentences.cn: 他接受的是正规的 中产阶级 教育.

sentences.en: He owed his success to the good upbringing he had.
sentences.cn: 他的成功归功于他受到的良好教养.

sentences.en: His attitude to sex is coloured by his strict upbringing.
sentences.cn: 他所受到的严厉教养,影响了他对两性的态度.

sentences.en: His dissolute life is inconsistent with his Puritan upbringing.
sentences.cn: 他的放荡生活和他的清教徒教养相悖.

sentences.en: I thought that my upbringing was "normal", whatever that is.
sentences.cn: 我认为我的成长过程甭管怎么说还算“正常”。

sentences.en: Martin's upbringing shaped his whole life.
sentences.cn: 马丁的家庭教养影响了他的一生。

sentences.en: Mike had had a strict upbringing.
My mother, who had a sheltered upbringing, has fantastic memories of childhood.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈在呵护下长大，对童年有着非常美好的回忆。

sentences.en: Part of answer, of course, lay in his upbringing.
sentences.cn: 当然, 答案的一部分在于他所受到的教养.

sentences.en: Sam's mother said her son had a good upbringing and schooling.
sentences.cn: 萨姆的母亲说她儿子家教好，受过良好教育。

sentences.en: This is to help her to come to terms with her early upbringing and make sense of past experiences.
sentences.cn: 这旨在帮助她认可自己早先所受的教育，并让她了解自己过去的经历。

sentences.en: to have had a sheltered upbringing

trans.tran_en: the way that your parents care for you and teach you to behave when you are growing up
